contextId.occurrenceNote: The litotes "not to neglect" is an understatement to emphasize that the writers want Artaxerxes to do what they tell him to do. Alternate translation: "Be careful to do this" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: Be careful not to neglect this

contextId.occurrenceNote: This litotes can be translated in positive form. Alternate translation: "we will need a long time to do all this work" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: this is not only one or two days of work
